title: Forecast Energy Production from Solar Farm
description: A grid operator needs a forecast of the expected energy production from the city's main solar farm for the next day to plan other generation.

tasks.description: Retrieve the next day's weather forecast, specifically cloud cover and solar irradiance levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the necessary weather data.

tasks.description: Input the weather forecast into the solar production forecasting model.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system runs the prediction model.

tasks.description: Generate an hour-by-hour forecast of the solar farm's expected megawatt output for the next 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the grid operator with an actionable energy forecast.
